pullRequest.title: Remaining master/slave replacements
pullRequest.bodyText:
related to: #10071

gc master/slave -> main/worker (changes that were not related to previous omr dependent pr)
AttachHandler jcl masterLock->controllerLock

Signed-off-by: Theresa Mammarella Theresa.T.Mammarella@ibm.com

nodes.bodyText: @SueChaplain fyi. Does any doc need to be modified or regenerated after these changes?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -49,7 +49,7 @@ J9NLS.HEADER=verbosenls.h
 J9NLS_VERB_STACK_USAGE=Verbose stack: \"%2$.*1$s\" used %3$zd/%4$zd bytes on Java/C stacks
 # START NON-TRANSLATABLE
 J9NLS_VERB_STACK_USAGE.sample_input_1=11
-J9NLS_VERB_STACK_USAGE.sample_input_2=Gc Slave Thread
+J9NLS_VERB_STACK_USAGE.sample_input_2=Gc Worker Thread

nodes.bodyText:
The changes in this class are problematic, as they are publicly documented API. Changing these could break a user's application.
https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSYKE2_8.0.0/com.ibm.java.api.80.doc/com.ibm.lang.management/com/ibm/lang/management/MemoryMXBean.html

beforeCommit.message:

nodes.bodyText:
Pls use the long form for Java 11+, i.e. @Deprecated(forRemoval=true, since="15").
You can create the processor instructions for Java 16 and remove the methods for Java 16+.
